item.title: Pull request #808 created
item.description:
Tweaks to highlight new functions in F&O

Following a discussion on the XML.com slack, this is a little lunchtime hackery...

Any function listed in the new-functions section of the changes appendix or identified with an ednote that contains the string New in 4.0 will be marked as ðŸ†• in the specification. The ðŸ†• occurs in the ToC, the drop-down function list, and to the left of the section title.

(I'm just going to merge this as it has no spec changes and the effect won't be visible in the PR anyway.)
